name: Dusty Planes
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD - move around

E - toggle lights

Just some game I made a couple months previously, thought I'd upload. Basically, there's gravity on this massive-ass planet, and you're a drone. The planet physically rotates, and you rotate with it. I could've done something with this game, but to be honest, the math behind it is just too much for me.
